channel.title: Descriptive Statistics and Displays on R & Analiz
channel.description: Recent content in Descriptive Statistics and Displays on R & Analiz

item.title: Frequency Tables
item.description: #Import dataset (code below only works if file is in working directory) med <- read.csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fabricandofitfaber/mayhem/master/MedicalData.csv') #Create and view frequency table of age groups agetab <- table(med$Age) agetab ## ## adult older adult young adult ## 99 27 29 #View table proportions prop.table(agetab) ## ## adult older adult young adult ## 0.6387097 0.1741935 0.1870968 #Create bar chart barplot(agetab,main='Age Distribution',xlab='Age Group',ylab='Frequency',ylim=c(0,100)) #Re-order age categories med$Age <- factor(med$Age, levels=c('young adult','adult','older adult')) #Re-run bar chart

item.title: Contingency Tables
item.description: Import dataset post <- read.csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fabricandofitfaber/mayhem/master/PostSurvey.csv') Create contingency table gendsport <- table(post$UT_sport, post$gender) gendsport ## ## Female Male ## no 150 16 ## yes 40 8 Row percentages prop.table(gendsport,1) ## ## Female Male ## no 0.90361446 0.09638554 ## yes 0.83333333 0.16666667 Column percentages prop.table(gendsport,2) ## ## Female Male ## no 0.7894737 0.6666667 ## yes 0.2105263 0.3333333 Make grouped bar chart barplot(gendsport,beside=T,legend=T,main='Play Sports by Gender', xlab='Gender',ylab='Frequency') Make mosaic plot barplot(prop.
